# python -m nuitka --follow-imports getframe_bug.py
import sys

def _S(expr):
  frame = sys._getframe(1)
  result = '%s = %s ' % (expr, repr(eval(expr, frame.f_globals, frame.f_locals)))
  return result

def main():
  a = 10
  print(_S('a+10'))

if __name__ == '__main__':
  main()
